com.basho.riak.client.core.operations

Class SecondaryIndexQueryOperation.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.basho.riak.client.core.operations.SecondaryIndexQueryOperation.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    SecondaryIndexQueryOperation

    public static class SecondaryIndexQueryOperation.Builder
extends Object
    Builder that constructs a SecondaryIndexQueryOperation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SecondaryIndexQueryOperation.Builder(BinaryValue bucketName, BinaryValue indexName)
      Constructs a builder using the supplied bucket name and index name.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SecondaryIndexQueryOperation.Builder

        public SecondaryIndexQueryOperation.Builder(BinaryValue bucketName,
                                    BinaryValue indexName)
        Constructs a builder using the supplied bucket name and index name. The index name must be the complete name with the _int or _bin suffix.
        Parameters:
        bucketName - the name of the bucket.
        indexName - the name of the index (including suffix).

    • Method Detail

      • withBucketType

        public SecondaryIndexQueryOperation.Builder withBucketType(BinaryValue bucketType)
        Set the Bucket Type for the query. If not set the default type is used.
        Parameters:
        bucketType - the bucket type.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withIndexKey

        public SecondaryIndexQueryOperation.Builder withIndexKey(BinaryValue key)
        Set a single secondary index key to use for query. If querying a _int index the bytes must be the UTF-8 text representation of an integer (Yes, really).
        Parameters:
        key - the secondary index key.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withRangeStart

        public SecondaryIndexQueryOperation.Builder withRangeStart(BinaryValue startingIndex)
        Set the start value for a range query. If querying a _int index the bytes must be the UTF-8 text representation of an integer (Yes, really).
        Parameters:
        startingIndex - the starting index for a range query.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withRangeEnd

        public SecondaryIndexQueryOperation.Builder withRangeEnd(BinaryValue endIndex)
        Set the ending value for a range query. If querying a _int index the bytes must be the UTF-8 text representation of an integer (Yes, really).
        Parameters:
        endIndex - the ending index for a range query.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withReturnKeyAndIndex

        public SecondaryIndexQueryOperation.Builder withReturnKeyAndIndex(boolean returnBoth)
        Set whether to return the index keys with the Riak object keys. Setting this to true will return both the index key and the Riak object's key. The default is false (only to return the Riak object keys).
        Parameters:
        returnBoth - true to return both index and object keys, false to return only object keys.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withMaxResults

        public SecondaryIndexQueryOperation.Builder withMaxResults(int maxResults)
        Set the maximum number of results returned by the query.
        Parameters:
        maxResults - the number of results.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withContinuation

        public SecondaryIndexQueryOperation.Builder withContinuation(BinaryValue continuation)
        Set the continuation for this query.
        Parameters:
        continuation - the continuation.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withPaginationSort

        public SecondaryIndexQueryOperation.Builder withPaginationSort(boolean orderByKey)
        Set whether to sort the results of a non-paginated 2i query.

        Setting this to true will sort the results in Riak before returning them.

        Note that this is not recommended for queries that could return a large result set; the overhead in Riak is substantial.

        Parameters:
        orderByKey - true to sort the results, false to return as-is.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withRegexTermFilter

        public SecondaryIndexQueryOperation.Builder withRegexTermFilter(BinaryValue filter)
        Set the regex to filter result terms by for this query.
        Parameters:
        filter - the regex to filter terms by.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • build

        public SecondaryIndexQueryOperation build()
        Construct a new SecondaryIndexQueryOperation.
        Returns:
        a SecondaryIndexQueryOperation
